name: Tumblr's Timeline Dark
description: A darker CSS for your Tumblr's CSS. It has portrait and landscape mode each one having little tweaks for each mode. You can change the wallpapers easily. You must have some kind of adblocker or you will have the CSS weird in the top section.

user.name: TheSound
user.about: I need this as stylish backup, since it doesn't save my sheets through Sync >:
